content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at Position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5) with coal fuel
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5) generating electricity
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Power poles creating an electricity network
- The system is operational with coal added to the boiler and steam engine connected to the power network

### Coal Mining Operation at Position(17.0, 10.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x=17.0, y=10.0) mining coal
- Wooden chest (position x=16.5, y=8.5) collecting coal output (contains 103 coal)
- Currently operational with coal fuel

### Iron Mining and Processing System
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=17.5, y=72.5) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest (position x=17.5, y=74.5) collecting iron ore (contains 743 iron ore)
- Inserter (position x=18.5, y=74.5) moving iron ore from chest
- Electric furnace (position x=29.5, y=76.5) for smelting iron ore
- Second electric furnace (position x=22.5, y=76.5) connected to power
- Wooden chest (position x=32.5, y=76.5) for collecting iron plates
- Inserter (position x=31.5, y=76.5) for moving iron plates to output chest
- Inserter (position x=17.5, y=76.5) for moving iron ore

### Manual Iron Smelting and Transport System at Position(40.0, 40.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position x=40.0, y=40.0) smelting iron ore into plates
- Wooden chest (position x=42.5, y=40.5) collecting iron plates (contains 5 iron plates)
- Inserter (position x=41.5, y=40.5) moving iron plates to chest
- Inserter (position x=42.5, y=41.5) moving iron plates to transport belt
- Inserter (position x=41.5, y=39.5) moving iron from furnace to belt
- Transport belt system from position (42.5, 42.5) extending in multiple directions:
  - Belt network going down from (42.5, 42.5) to (42.5, 45.5)
  - Belt network going right from (45.5, 45.5) to (47.5, 45.5)
  - Belt network going up from (47.5, 45.5) to (47.5, 43.5)
  - The belt system forms a loop connecting to the existing iron plate transport system

### Manual Copper Smelting and Transport System at Position(40.0, 50.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position x=40.0, y=50.0) smelting copper ore into plates
- Wooden chest (position x=42.5, y=50.5) collecting copper plates (contains 10 copper plates)
- Inserter (position x=41.5, y=50.5) moving copper plates to chest
- Inserter (position x=42.5, y=51.5) moving copper plates to transport belt
- Inserter (position x=43.5, y=49.5) moving items from belt to chest
- Inserter (position x=41.5, y=49.5) moving copper from furnace to belt
- Transport belt system from position (42.5, 52.5) to (55.5, 50.5) with direction changed to RIGHT

### Copper Mining Operation at Position(-47.5, 77.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position x=-47.5, y=77.5) mining copper ore
- Wooden chest (position x=-47.5, y=79.5) collecting copper ore (contains 752 copper ore)

### Iron Gear Production at Position(50.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
